content.text: Nice to meet you [user 2 name]! What do you do for fun?
I like to work on a variety of projects, like writing music, painting, and building things.
That's awesome! I love to do art too. What kind of music do you write?
I write hip-hop. I've been rapping for a few years, and I'm really passionate about it.
That's really cool! I've never met a rapper before.
It's not as common as you might think.
What's your favorite thing about rapping?
I love the creative process of writing lyrics and coming up with new flows. It's so much fun to be able to express myself through music.
That makes sense. I love expressing myself through art too.
It's a great way to let out your emotions.
Definitely! Do you have any shows coming up?
I'm actually performing at a local bar next weekend.
Oh cool! I'll have to come check it out.
